Lucas Holloway

From Achron Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search

Lucas was born in Crestview Resettlement, New York, son of David and Laura. He attended CESO Fleet Training Facilities at San Francisco, California and Aldrin Park, Luna, and volunteered for Shrike biomedical modification and became part of the "Death Walkers" survivor group after the program was shut down to revise procedures for higher survival rates.

Only a few years before the invasion of the Remnant System, Largo Major revolted against a set of CESO trade sanctions laid against them for aggressive actions taken against their nearest neighbor. A fleet detachment was sent in to put down their patchwork military forces.

He served with distinction during the Largo Major revolt, where he took command of the C.E. Matador after its entire bridge crew were killed by a bomb attached to the ship's primary command hull. Holloway led the rest of the Largo Major assault fleet to the successful completion of their campaign objectives.

According to official records, Holloway turned down a promotion and retired from active duty. He resumed active duty two years later to help combat the invasion of Remnant at the rank of lieutenant commander aboard the capital ship C.E. Saratoga.

Holloway was one of the first humans to chronoport.
